titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey certain land at Fort Campbell, Kentucky and Tennessee, for the purpose of realigning and upgrading United States Highway 79 from a 2-lane highway to a 4-lane highway.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 4/3/2003--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to convey to the department of transportation of Tennessee specified real property at Fort Campbell, Kentucky and Tennessee, for purposes of realigning and upgrading United States Highway 79 from a two-lane highway to a four-lane highway.
